body_html:
@asimshankar Thanks. How can I switch between CPU and GPU when I use eager execution? Since some operations like tf.tensordot do not have GPU kernels and I need to accelerate other related operations. It seems that

tfe.enable_eager_execution(device_policy=tfe.DEVICE_PLACEMENT_SILENT)

doesn't work.
body:
@asimshankar Thanks. How can I switch between CPU and GPU when I use eager execution? Since some operations like `tf.tensordot` do not have GPU kernels and I need to accelerate other related operations. It seems that
```python
tfe.enable_eager_execution(device_policy=tfe.DEVICE_PLACEMENT_SILENT)
```
doesn't work.
